mapper.insert: insert into e_customer (id, username, password, zip, address, phone, email) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update e_customer set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, zip, address, phone, email from e_customer
